name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D BIRTHDAY LIVE】ARCANA - Mori Calliope's Birthday Concert! With Many Guests! [YRySeGZNzQ0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope and TOOBOE discuss their collaboration on the song "Sepia" and its music video.
A transition sequence with visual effects leading into the final song introduction.
Mori Calliope introduces the final song of the concert, "Sepia".
Performance of the song "Sepia" by Mori Calliope and TOOBOE.
Post-performance MC and thanks to the audience.
Mori Calliope's final farewell message to the viewers.
Outro end card for the concert.

subtitles.original: そうですよね。何かあれですよね。
subtitles.english: That's right. It's, like,

subtitles.original: 僕あんまり、あの、絵柄が多分相当違うものなので、
subtitles.english: our art styles are really different,

subtitles.original: どうしようかなと思ったんですけど。
subtitles.english: so I was wondering how we would do this.

subtitles.original: せっかくならお互いの良さ出せるようなアニメ作れればいいなってことで。
subtitles.english: But we decided to aim for an anime MV that'd showcase both of our styles.

subtitles.original: 僕もちょっと全体の話のプロットとかも考えましたし、
subtitles.english: I worked with you on the overall plot and story,

subtitles.original: キャラもちょっと1体か2体描かせていただいて、
subtitles.english: and designed a couple of characters.

subtitles.original: 成りましたね。はい。
subtitles.english: And it all came together.

subtitles.original: はい。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: なかなか面白いMVになりましたから、皆さんぜひこの後チェックしてほしい。
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's quite an fun and entertaining music video, so please check it out, guys.

subtitles.original: はい。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、どんな曲を作ったかな？
subtitles.english: I bet everyone's wondering what the song is like.

subtitles.original: 皆さんに聴かせましょう。
subtitles.english: So let's have them listen to it!

subtitles.original: はい。行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Yeah. Okay, here we go!

subtitles.original: 皆さん、これは最後の曲です。
subtitles.english: Everyone, this is the last song.

subtitles.original: TOOBOE x Calliope 新曲 "Sepia" Check it out!
subtitles.english: TOOBOE x Calliope new song "Sepia". Check it out.

subtitles.original:
Sepia feat. TOOBOE
Lyrics: Mori Calliope, TOOBOE / Music, Arrangement: TOOBOE
subtitles.english:
Sepia feat. TOOBOE
Lyrics: Mori Calliope, TOOBOE / Music, Arrangement: TOOBOE

subtitles.original: 誤解しないで、滑稽だな
subtitles.english: Don't misunderstand, it's laughable

subtitles.original: 察せ、毒され Everyday
subtitles.english: How time flashes by every day

subtitles.original: 誰も化かせない、運命の囚人
subtitles.english: Another prisoner of fate no one could fake out

subtitles.original: Stay awake now, you know you wanna fire away
subtitles.english: Stay awake now, you know you wanna fire away

subtitles.original: もう責任なんてないさ
subtitles.english: Now there's no question where the fault lies

subtitles.original: 共鳴さえできない毎日
subtitles.english: These days I struggle just to empathize

subtitles.original: もう戻らないって、解っているんだろう
subtitles.english: There's no going back, and you know that

subtitles.original: Cast a blessing on my cursed role
subtitles.english: Cast a blessing on my cursed role

subtitles.original: And feed this bleeding egotistical soul
subtitles.english: And feed this bleeding egotistical soul

subtitles.original: Before you know it, it's the moment you've lost all control
subtitles.english: Before you know it, it's the moment you've lost all control

subtitles.original: 時日の夢を見るたび
subtitles.english: Every time I dream of days gone by

subtitles.original: 生まれた意味を考えてしまうのさ
subtitles.english: I wonder why I came to be

subtitles.original: 嗚呼、美しき蒼い日々だな
subtitles.english: Ah, such beautiful, youthful days

subtitles.original: この目に焼き付けておこうかな
subtitles.english: I should burn their images into my mind

subtitles.original: もう少し強くならないとな
subtitles.english: But I'd have to be a little stronger first

subtitles.original: 嫉妬のセットにまみれた
subtitles.english: Dripping in jealousy that's a bit too daring

subtitles.original: ちょっと足りないエクスタシー
subtitles.english: An ecstasy that's just a little bit lacking

subtitles.original: 迎えも解けないまま、他人傷つけて
subtitles.english: I hurt somebody without ever opening my eyes

subtitles.original: 当然、才すら無いわ
subtitles.english: But there's no talent here, it's clear to see

subtitles.original: 転がり落ちたイカサマのダイス
subtitles.english: The rigged dice falls and rolls

subtitles.original: 貴方の愛に気付けないまま
subtitles.english: Before I ever notice your love and affection

subtitles.original: Cast a blessing on my cursed heart
subtitles.english: Cast a blessing on my cursed heart

subtitles.original: Why keep me breathing while it's falling apart?
subtitles.english: Why keep me breathing while it's falling apart?

subtitles.original: どうか、神様、教えてくれ
subtitles.english: Pray tell me, God

subtitles.original: 言葉少なに貴方に捧ぐ
subtitles.english: I give to you silently

subtitles.original: 今にも消えてしまいそうなこの命を
subtitles.english: My life that's about to burn out

subtitles.original: 愛おしいセピア色した
subtitles.english: Ah, and these sepia-toned

subtitles.original: 何より大事なこの景色を
subtitles.english: Sights, most precious of all

subtitles.original: もう少し見ていたいよな
subtitles.english: That I wish I could watch some more

subtitles.original: I'm always gonna be my own worst enemy
subtitles.english: I'm always gonna be my own worst enemy

subtitles.original: Everything I ever wanted was in front of me
subtitles.english: Everything I ever wanted was in front of me

subtitles.original: The angels on my shoulder still cannot agree
subtitles.english: The angels on my shoulder still cannot agree

subtitles.english: If I was somebody else, could I get everything?

subtitles.english: I'm always gonna be my own worst enemy

subtitles.english: The devils on my shoulder never let me be

subtitles.original: Obsessing over tomorrows that I'll never see
subtitles.english: Obsessing over tomorrows that I'll never see

subtitles.english: Somebody save me

subtitles.english: My world is caving in 'cause I thought I deserved it all for free

subtitles.english: Every time I dream of days gone by

subtitles.english: I wonder why I came to be

subtitles.english: Ah, such beautiful, youthful days

subtitles.english: I should burn their images into my mind

subtitles.english: But I'd have to be a little stronger first

subtitles.original: 皆さん、聴いてくれてありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you for listening!

subtitles.original: よいしょ。
subtitles.english: All right.
